PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-02802017-03-24,  PS,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 205, British Columbia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 205 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the provision of financial assistance to the province of BRITISH COLUMBIA, with respect to the opioid overdose crisis that resulted in the declaration of a public health emergency by the province on April 14, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
